cmds.cmd: liblist -a kurs16 2> /dev/null; liblist -a QGPL 2> /dev/null; cl -v "CRTSQLRPGI OBJ("'kurs16/logger'") SRCSTMF('"'src/KURS16/qrpglesrc/logger.sqlrpgle.pgm'"') OBJTYPE(*PGM) RPGPPOPT(*LVL2) TGTRLS(*CURRENT) DBGVIEW(*SOURCE) REPLACE(*YES) COMPILEOPT('TGTCCSID(*JOB) ')"; echo '=============(!)JOBLOG(!)===================='; cl -v "DSPJOBLOG"

liblist -a kurs16 2> /dev/null; liblist -a QGPL 2> /dev/null; cl -v "CRTBNDRPG PGM("'kurs16/rechner'") SRCSTMF('"'src/KURS16/qrpglesrc/rechner.rpgle.pgm'"') DBGVIEW(*ALL) REPLACE(*YES) TGTCCSID(*JOB) "; echo '=============(!)JOBLOG(!)===================='; cl -v "DSPJOBLOG"

liblist -a kurs16 2> /dev/null; liblist -a QGPL 2> /dev/null; cl -v "CRTBNDRPG PGM("'kurs16/testlog'") SRCSTMF('"'src/KURS16/qrpglesrc/testlog.rpgle.pgm'"') DBGVIEW(*ALL) REPLACE(*YES) TGTCCSID(*JOB) "; echo '=============(!)JOBLOG(!)===================='; cl -v "DSPJOBLOG"

liblist -a kurs16 2> /dev/null; liblist -a QGPL 2> /dev/null; cl -v "CRTBNDRPG PGM("'kurs16/verbinder'") SRCSTMF('"'src/KURS16/qrpglesrc/verbinder.rpgle.pgm'"') DBGVIEW(*ALL) REPLACE(*YES) TGTCCSID(*JOB) "; echo '=============(!)JOBLOG(!)===================='; cl -v "DSPJOBLOG"
